properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine be the glory Risen conquering Son Endless is the victory Thou o’er death hast won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Angels in bright raiment Rolled the stone away Kept the folded grave clothes Where Thy body lay{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine be the glory Risen conquering Son Endless is the victory Thou o’er death hast won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lo! Jesus meets us Risen from the tomb Lovingly, He greets us Scatters fear and gloom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let the church with gladness Hymns of triumph sing For her Lord now liveth Death hath lost its sting{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine be the glory Risen conquering Son Endless is the victory Thou o’er death hast won{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No more we doubt Thee Glorious Prince of life Life is naught without Thee Aid us in our strife{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make us more than conquerors Through Thy deathless love Bring us safe through Jordan To Thy home above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thine is the glory Risen conquering Son Endless is the victory Thou o’er death hast won 10. Hallelujah, Amen{/lang-eng}
